name: User can see the detail page of each product -- @1.2

steps.name: Given I am logged in as a user with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
When I visit the inventory page
And I click on the product with name "Sauce Labs Bike Light"

Then I should see the detail page of the product wit all its content and the correct product name "Sauce Labs Bike Light", "$9.99", "A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding your bike at night. Water-resistant with 3 lighting modes, 1 AAA battery included."

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding your bike at night. Water-resistant with 3 lighting modes, 1 AAA battery included.

fullName: Detail page functionallity test: User can see the detail page of each product
